text: Red Cup Day, the iconic event by Starbucks, is finally back for its customers in 2024. Celebrated across all outlets of Starbucks around the world, the day has become a tradition at the coffee chain since its commencement in 1999. Fans of the coffee franchise are thus eager to learn everything about this event and its significance. Here are all the details fans need to know about the Red Cup Day and how one can enjoy the benefits of the offers that are up on this day. Red Cup Day 2024 at Starbucks explained Starbucks has recently announced that its Red Cup Day is scheduled to take place today, i.e., November 14, 2024. According to a report by USA Today, Red Cup Day is the day on which the customers of Starbucks can get a special red-colored reusable cup. It is marketed as a holiday edition and is available only for a limited period. Customers can attain this red cup by ordering the holiday drinks at the coffee outlets. The report further states that the customers who bring the limited edition cup with them back to Starbucks in the future will be eligible for a 10-cent discount. Additionally, the Starbucks Rewards members will get 25 stars upon bringing the cup with them. The beverages for which the customers can get the cup are available for purchase on the Starbucks app, in the drive-thru, and at the outlet. Announcing the Red Cup Day, Starbucks wrote on Instagram, “A gift from us to you. Get your limited edition reusable red cup on November 14th with the purchase of any handcrafted holiday beverage. Quantities are limited, while supplies last. At participating U.S. & Canada stores.” According to the aforementioned report, the menu on which customers can get the red cup are: Apple Crisp Nondairy Cream Chai Tea Latte Apple Crisp Oatmilk Macchiato Apple Crisp Oatmilk Shaken Espresso Caramel Brulée Latte Chestnut Praline Latte Cran-Merry Orange Refresher Cran-Merry Lemonade Refresher Cran-Merry Drink Gingerbread Oatmilk Chai Hot Chocolate Pecan Crunch Oatmilk Latte Peppermint Hot Chocolate Peppermint Mocha Peppermint White Hot Chocolate Pumpkin Cream Chai Tea Latte Pumpkin Cream Cold Brew Pumpkin Spice Latte Salted Pecan Crunch Cold Brew Sugar Cookie Almondmilk Latte White Hot Chocolate

Red Cup Day, the iconic event by Starbucks, is finally back for its customers in 2024. Celebrated across all outlets of Starbucks around the world, the day has become a tradition at the coffee chain since its commencement in 1999. Fans of the coffee franchise are thus eager to learn everything about this event and its significance.

Here are all the details fans need to know about the Red Cup Day and how one can enjoy the benefits of the offers that are up on this day.

Red Cup Day 2024 at Starbucks explained

Starbucks has recently announced that its Red Cup Day is scheduled to take place today, i.e., November 14, 2024.

According to a report by USA Today, Red Cup Day is the day on which the customers of Starbucks can get a special red-colored reusable cup. It is marketed as a holiday edition and is available only for a limited period. Customers can attain this red cup by ordering the holiday drinks at the coffee outlets.

The report further states that the customers who bring the limited edition cup with them back to Starbucks in the future will be eligible for a 10-cent discount. Additionally, the Starbucks Rewards members will get 25 stars upon bringing the cup with them. The beverages for which the customers can get the cup are available for purchase on the Starbucks app, in the drive-thru, and at the outlet.

Announcing the Red Cup Day, Starbucks wrote on Instagram, “A gift from us to you. Get your limited edition reusable red cup on November 14th with the purchase of any handcrafted holiday beverage. Quantities are limited, while supplies last. At participating U.S. & Canada stores.”

According to the aforementioned report, the menu on which customers can get the red cup are:

  • Apple Crisp Nondairy Cream Chai Tea Latte
  • Apple Crisp Oatmilk Macchiato
  • Apple Crisp Oatmilk Shaken Espresso

  • Cran-Merry Orange Refresher

  • Gingerbread Oatmilk Chai
